forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
